content: Hi everybody, I would like to start creating more examples for some of the elements in our IG. I am wondering if there is a best practices of how to do so. I saw this blog post (https://fhirblog.com/2014/08/08/creating-examples-in-fhir/), which appears interesting, but I am not sure how I would integrate that into the example code. Also, do I need to create XML, JSON, and Turtle versions of each example or is there some way to do that automatically?
